articles.description: NINL is a joint venture of MMTC, NMDC, BHEL, MECON, and two Odisha government-owned undertakings - OMC and IPICOL

articles.title: Elon Musk: SpaceX SN-11 launch postponed after FAA inspector unable to reach Boca Chica facility - KRGV
articles.description: The much-anticipated launch of SpaceX’s Starship prototype SN-11 on Monday has been postponed not because of the weather— but because of a problem with the Federal Aviation Administration.
articles.content:
